version_description:
Get ready to loop your custom playlists!

- Looper now includes Playlist Loops. Add videos and select a number of loops per video and playlist.

• New Feature •
- Love using Force Touch? Now you can use Force Touch to select a video without entering Looper!

• New Feature •
- When connected to a external screen or connected via Airplay, you can still use Looper while looping videos on the screen.

Thanks for the reviews! Keep reviewing so we can make Looper a better App.

• Important Bug Fixes •
- Removes the black borders when mirroring on an external screen.

Thanks for the reviews! Keep reviewing so we can make Looper a better App.

• In-App Bug Fix•
- You can now restore previous In-App Purchases.

• Black Borders when Mirroring •
- If you're mirroring via Apple TV you'll get some ugly black borders, to get rid of them, just go to your Apple TV and then in "Settings > Audio & Video > Adjust for AirPlay Overscan" and turn it to "Off".

• Important Color Bug Fixes •
- Whoops, this update removes that orange background color when mirroring.

Thanks for the reviews! Keep reviewing so we can make Looper a better App.

• New Feature •
- Now you can select a single video, choose a number of loops and export the video to the Camera Roll.

• Sound •
- Sound is enabled again.

Thanks for the reviews! Keep reviewing so we can make Looper a better App.

• Bug Fixes •
- Important sound and black borders fixes. Thanks for your patience.

Thanks for the reviews! Keep reviewing so we can make Looper a better App.

• Bug Fixes •

- Sorry for taking so long, this update fixes the crashes in iOS 10.

If you have problems playing the video, remember to select the nut and choose the looping times or the Loop Forever option.

Keep writing reviews, so we can make Looper a better App.

• Bug Fixes •
- Fixes an error on the Playlists section, where the playlist was unable to find some videos.
- Fixes an error that caused some videos to be muted.

• New •
- New design & icons.

• BUGS •
- Minor bug fixes.

• New:
- Are you ready to export playlists? Cause we are! Get your Looper Pro In-App purchase, create playlists + export them to your camera roll for FREE.

•Bug Fixes:
- Selecting videos from Home Videos, Films & Music Videos is now available, sorry for the inconvenience.

Thanks for the reviews! Keeps writing so we can make Looper a better App.

• NEW •
- Compatibility with iPhone X.
- You can now choose to export in Portrait or Landscape.

Thanks for using Looper!

• NEW
Happy Holidays! For a limited time get Looper Pro for just $0.99 USD!

• Bugs
- Fixes a crash when accessing to "Home Videos" and "Movies".

• Bugs
- Fixes a bug when selecting/replacing a video in Playlists that makes Looper to crash.
- Selection from Movies and Music Videos will be disabled for now.

•BUGS
- Fixes a bug that makes Looper crash when exporting a video without audio.
- Fixes a bug that replaces the wrong video inside a playlist.

Thanks for the reviews! Please keep reviewing so we can make Looper more stable and better each day. Got any ideas for Looper? Email us at apps@iokanan.com

• Bugs
- Fixes a bug when selecting/replacing a video in Playlists that makes Looper to crash.
- Selection from Movies and Music Videos will be disabled for now.

• NEW
- We completely redesigned Looper, hope you love it!

• BUGS
- Minor bug fixes.

• Bug Fixes
- Fixes a bug when obtaining Looper Pro.
- Fixes a bug in iPad when creating a new Playlist.
- Fixes a bug when connecting external displays.
- Fixes a bug when attempting to pause a video or playlist.

If you have problems when playing a video, please delete and add the video again.

• BUGS
- Fixes a crash when clicking the play button.
- Fixes a crash when selecting a video from Photos.

• Bugs.
- Minor bug fixes.

• Bugs
- Fixes a bug when trying to export a video or playlist.

• Bugs
- Fixes a crash to iPad Users when editing a Playlist.

• Minor bug fixes.
• Fixes a crash for iPad users when selecting "PRO".

This update contains:

• Small corrections

Send us a message if you have any questions or recommendations!

In this release, you can expect the following changes and fixes:

- Fixes Time-Lapse videos getting exported with the wrong orientation.
- We added support for Spanish language.

Questions, comments or cool ideas? Don't be shy! • apps@iokanan.com

Keep Looping

- We added a new Support section, send us your thoughts or share with us a bug you found.

Welcome to Looper 4.0

In this version, you can expect the following changes and corrections:

• New help section to learn how to use Looper with small video tutorials.
• Now you can play videos in a mirrored way.
• Now you can export videos as GIFs.
• Now you can export videos in a mirrored way.
• We have increased the maximum number of Loops to 150.
• Small bug fixes.

Cool questions, comments, or ideas? Do not be shy! • apps@iokanan.com
